description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_sales_order_simulation_srv` package provides APIs that enable seamless integration with the [Sales Order - Simulate (A2X) API v1.0.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_SALES_ORDER_SIMULATE_SRV/overview). The service gives you information about pricing, material availability, and the customer's credit limit. The simulated sales order is not saved.
